attributes.action: work to create an EU wide ban on the sale, purchase, import or export of sharks and shark derived products..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current shark slaughter is the greatest manmade ecological disaster in history. 100 million are killed annually to make soup in China. Many species are now over 90% fished out. Sharks breed slowly so it is difficult for populations to recover.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
